Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add iRacing wheel slip comparison and fix calculation issues

- Fixed throttle blending: Set multi = 0.2 for sway and surge calculations
- Fixed SlipBrake: Now uses calculated blend_brake instead of raw slip
- Simplified ABS calculation to remove redundant multiplication
- Added ShakeIT raw slip display properties (8 new properties)
- Added custom iRacing-compatible slip calculation using Schnirbus method
- Implemented side-by-side slip comparison UI (ShakeIT vs Custom)
- Custom slip uses wheel speeds with lateral/longitudinal acceleration modulation
- Exported DDFRacer.CustomSlip properties for all 4 wheels
- Added .gitignore for C# Visual Studio projects

EOF
)")
